description: Joe Lynch (Co-Writer/Director), Adam Ripp (Producer), Luke Rivett (Producer), Ricky Budhani (Executive Producer), Brett Hedblom (Co-Producer), Andrew Pfeffer (Producer)
synopsis: Salma Hayek stars as a tough yet vulnerable woman who must fight her way through a gauntlet of assassins in this fist-pumping action thriller.
title: Everly
